unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Independent Dice
question_text:
Suppose two fair dice are rolled at the same time.
Which of the following events are independent?

choices.text: One die is a $1$; sum of the two dice is $4$.
One die is prime; sum of the two dice is $2$.
One die is a $3$; the other die is also a $3$.
One die is a $6$; sum of the two dice is NOT a $12$.
One die is a $6$; sum of the two dice is a $12$.
